alert.note: Alert for Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 9:32AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Montcalm County through 1015 AM EDT... At 932 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Howard City, or 11 miles north of Greenville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Edmore... McBride... Pierson... Langston... Westville... Cedar Lake... Entrican... Six Lakes... Trufant... Vestaburg... Turk Lake... Wyman... Coral... Gowen... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
